hello: Hello! I am Eduardo García Romera, a computer engineering student and passionate about technology and creating websites. Here you will find a sample of my projects and skills.
about_content: As a fourth-year computer engineering student at the UNED, I am deepening my knowledge in the field while pursuing my studies remotely. In addition, I work as a Junior Full-Stack Developer, with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Java, and SQL. My main goal is to merge design and functionality harmoniously to create effective and attractive digital experiences for users.
skills_content: My skills are versatile and range from back-end development to user experience on the front-end. My skill set includes mastery of Java, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, Sass, and HTML, along with experience in libraries and frameworks like React.js, BootStrap, JQuery, Redux, and SpringBoot. Furthermore, I have experience in project management, API development, SEO, and web marketing, allowing me to create comprehensive and effective solutions. I am also familiar with languages and tools like C++, MongoDB, Git, and GitHub, as well as project management platforms like Jira and communication platforms like Slack. I am committed to continuous learning and am always looking for opportunities to improve and expand my skills in the field of web development.
personal_portfolio: I developed this portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my skills and projects.
coming_soon: As I complete the improvement and adaptation of the projects I am working on, I will add them to this portfolio. Currently, I am focusing on optimizing and perfecting these works to ensure they properly represent the quality and innovation I wish to showcase. I invite you to visit my GitHub to see some of my current and past projects, offering you a broader perspective of my experience and skills as I continue to enrich this portfolio.
git: Professional Course on Git and GitHub
internship: I developed web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React for the front-end, and worked on the back-end using Java with Spring Boot.
sales_representative: I managed sales and customer relationships remotely, using digital tools and communication platforms.
store_clerk: I provided customer service, managed inventory, and maintained the store presentation.
contact_content: Let's talk! I am always interested in new projects and collaborations. You can contact me by email at edugar130@gmail.com
